name: test_e2e_with_logs[466_XXE_ENCODE_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_ENCODE_003` |
| **Name** | XXE Double-Encoded Exclamation ENTITY |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | encoded_xxe |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/hosts">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22file%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fhosts%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~49000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:27.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=XXE_ENCODE_003-1770842247011-jtqqc pattern_id=XXE_ENCODE_003 uri=/?q=%3C%21ENTITY%20xxe%20SYSTEM%20%22file%3A%2F%2F%2Fetc%2Fhosts%22%3E client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |
